mapper.insert: insert into member( m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_phone, m_email, m_level, m_cname, m_zip, m_addr1, m_addr2, m_pname, m_account, m_bank, m_sysdate, m_check )values( #{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{m_email}, #{m_level}, #{m_cname}, #{m_zip}, #{m_addr1}, #{m_addr2}, #{m_pname}, #{m_account}, #{m_bank}, sysdate, '0' )
